label: ball
caption: Two males in athletic gear are engaged in a heated game of field hockey, their sticks clashing as they chase after a speeding ball. One player, dressed in blue, makes a bold move to intercept the ball, but his opponent, clad in gold, skillfully blocks the shot and sends the ball flying back towards the goal. The players' faces are contorted with effort, their muscles straining as they battle for control of the ball.
